Headline: CTA Train Tracker May Be Temporarily Unavailable
ShortDescription: Info from CTA Train Tracker may be temporarily unavailable due to planned maintenance. Train service is not affected.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Information from CTA Train Tracker SM may be temporarily unavailable due to planned maintenance. Train service is unaffected.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/62nd
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses are rerouted in both directions via King Drive, 63rd, Indiana, 61st and King Drive, due to fire department activity near King Drive/62nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via King Drive, 63rd, Indiana, 61st, then resume their normal route on King Drive, due to fire department activity near King Drive/62nd.

Allow extra travel time.
